EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Follow up to today's call (1560366397.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Follow up to today's call (1560366397.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi John,
I hope all is well and sorry for catching you at a bad time. It has been a while since I have spoken to you and I wanted to ensure everything is going well and see if there is anything you require my assistance with. Please let me know if there is anything that I can help with. Thanks again for your time and I hope you're having a good day.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
